auth.url-error-copy: It has been copied to your clipboard, please visit the link directly to log in

claimModalFinePrint: Please note: claiming gems turns on analytics so we can improve Universe
claimModalText: Earn bonus XTM by mining and referring friends.
claimModalTitle: EARN REWARDS FOR MINING ON TESTNET
claimReferralCode: Claim your referral code {{gems}} gems.
claimReferralGifts: Claim your referral code and earn {{gems}} gems. Once you connect your account, you'll be awarded your gems.

crewRewards.earnDescription: Earn {{userReward}} XTM for every {{daysRequired}} days your friend mines. Your friend will also earn {{friendReward}} XTM.

crewRewards.inviteFriendsMessage: Invite friends and start earning bonus XTM!

login.bonusText: Earn bonus rewards up to {{maxWeeks}} weeks per invite
login.description: You earn {{userReward}} bonus XTM/week AND your friend earns {{friendReward}} bonus XTM/week when you and your friend both mine
login.title: Mine with friends. Earn together.

streak.daysToMinimum: {{days}} more days to meet minimum requirements!
streak.keepStreak: Keep your streak to keep earning rewards!
streak.mineConsecutiveDays: Mine for at least {{streakDaysRequired}} consecutive days each week to earn your bonus XTM.
streak.minimumRequirementsMet: You've met the minimum requirements. Keep going!
streak.startMiningMessage: Start mining to begin your streak and earn rewards!

crewRewards.title: Rewards

giftReferralCode: Earn bonus XTM for each friend you invite to Tari Universe. Once they connect their account and mine, you'll start earning rewards.

invite-friends-gems: For every friend that uses your invite link, you earn bonus XTM.
joinAirdropButtonAriaLabel: Join Airdrop and earn gems. Right-click to copy link
keep-mining-to-earn-rewards: Keep mining to earn more XTM rewards!

permissionNoGems.text: Tari Universe would like to use analytics to improve your experience.

push-notifications.text: Tari Universe would like to be able to send you notifications to your connected devices

your-friend-accepted-gift: One of your friends accepted your gift!
